title: Julie Powell, Author of ‘Julie & Julia,' Took Food Writing to a Franker, Darker Place
description: The food blogger, who died recently, was portrayed sunnily in “Julie & Julia,” but her work and her life held hard truths about domesticity.
dc:creator: Julia Moskin
media:description: Julie Powell in 2005. She had embarked on the Julie/Julia Project three years earlier with leek-and-potato soup, also the first recipe in Julia Child’s “Mastering the Art of French Cooking.”
